title: Who's the hottest female champion? (round 1)
body:
Hi all! So my friend InsertCleverPun was doing polls for who's the hottest male champion for a few days now. This time, I'll be hosting the who's the hottest female champion polls for a thing we're doing!

Here's the first half of the first round!

Karma, Lux, Cassiopeia, Kalista: http://www.strawpoll.me/15429932
Ashe, Quinn, Fiora, LeBlanc: http://www.strawpoll.me/15429947
Nidalee, Evelynn, Caitlyn, Kai'Sa: http://www.strawpoll.me/15429944
Syndra, Soraka, Elise, Diana: http://www.strawpoll.me/15429949
